item.description:
From Irene Davis

Director of the Spaulding National Running Center:

As part of our anniversary event, we are going to do a 2.62 Silent Run in honor of those affected by the Marathon bombings. We are leaving from Spaulding Outpatient Cambridge at 5:15 on Wed, 5/15/13 (Day AFTER the anniversary event)- on the one month anniversary of the bombings.

Lets make this a fun event with lots of runners.
item.how_to_find_us: On the Street infront of the Running Center. Leaving from the Outpatient area.
item.name: 2.62 Mile Silent Run, Spaulding National Running Center, Cambridge,MA
